about_the_game:
The relentless gears of the Eternal Engine grind on, but only change can fix a broken machine…

Thrust into the unfamiliar world of Site 41, play as a clueless soldier stuck in the middle of a compound-wide compromise. Traverse unsettling environments, solve engaging puzzles and discover grotesque truths in this frightening and surreal reimagining of the point-and-click horror genre.

TERMINAL ERROR takes place in the bleak and oppressive tunnels of Site 41, a secretive underground facility housing obscured and experimental technologies. Established by the Island Armed Forces (IAF), a professional army paranoid with maintaining their iron grip on military supremacy, the compound was meant to run endlessly. However, this perfect machine isn’t what it seems…

The plot begins with an unsuspecting soldier suddenly awakening to a foreign and suspiciously desolate guardhouse. Meeting a mysterious companion over the intercoms, the newfound allies investigate the cause of some seemingly unexpected system failures and end up in the centre of a more concerning disaster.

Stumble into a terrifying rabbit hole filled with dangerous secrets and reveal a horrific world buried beneath the ground...

Point-and-Click Revamped: Look around and interact with a tactile and engaging world as you unravel mysteries, now with a heightened sense of space

Move seamlessly through eerie corridors, searching for clues as you find your way around

Heal Up with Medkits: With dangers at every corners, you are bound to get injured. Heal up with unusual medkit system paired with our fascinating UI, spicing up the traditional healing experience

Simply tear open your medkit and apply it to your injury, it's easier than it looks...

Play with Guns: Your Rifle is your best friend. Collect bullets and load up your weapon, it'll definitely come in handy as you creep through these dangerous corridors

Stun and run enemies as you explore... The bullets might not kill monsters, but at least they slow them down. If you're lucky, maybe you could slip away in time.

Morbidly Twisted Worlds: Encounter grotesque monsters and explore haunting spaces plastered with flesh, blood and all forms of warped monstrosities as you learn more about the cryptic truth of the facility.

Don't get too close to the monsters though... They can easily grab you, entering into an interesting 'Struggling Minigame' sequence to escape the grasps of these creatures

It's probably better to just keep your distance... Luckily, they can't follow you into every space...

Stopping the Ceaseless Machine: Experience a unique story about an oppressive and controlling world desperately in need of change and reform.

content_descriptors.notes: Flesh and blood in the form of dismembered limbs and blood-covered rooms are to be expected. Mild violence in the form of enemy attacks and injury will also be present

name: Terminal Error

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz / AMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with (4GB VRAM) | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4GB VRAM )
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with (4GB VRAM) | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4GB VRAM )
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Play as a soldier in this experimental reimagining of point-and-click horror. Set in the suffocating chambers of an underground military facility, discover macabre truths, evade ghoulish monsters and delve deeper into the heart of the Eternal Engine.
